name: Puppet Football
description:
Pull your puppet's strings to control its limbs in this QWOP-esque sports game, played alone or with a friend.

Join together by holding space and pulling your opponent towards you.

Multiplayer Versus: Take on your friend in Football, Volleyball, or Basketball. Don't forget to try the "Crazy" modes and different modifiers.

Single-player Timed: Attempt to score as many goals as you can in one minute. Let us know your high scores!

Easily play online using the free Parsec remote control app - https://parsec.app/

Press ESC while in-game to go back to menu at any time.

FEATURES:

Controllable 2D ragdolls.

Slow-Mo.

Single-player timed mode.

Multiplayer versus mode.

Customisable score limit.

Seven total maps.

Moon gravity mode.

Two nice old men.

Team Toast is:
